body: Target names are global, so it is best to prefix them with `caffe2_`, i.e. `caffe2_dnnlowp_avx2_ops`.
body_html: Target names are global, so it is best to prefix them with caffe2_, i.e. caffe2_dnnlowp_avx2_ops.
